EmailTemplate.name: 2015 Grads - Goldman Sachs Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Got your ticket to the exclusive event with Goldman Sachs yet? Don't miss out!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Haven't got your tickets yet to Career Skills with Goldman Sachs? There's an event in an area near you next week!
Don't miss out on this exclusive opportunity!
Career Skills with Goldman Sachs is an absolutely unmissable professional development opportunity, just for HeadStart Grads! This event will be an opportunity to learn directly from professionals working for one of the world leaders in finance, enhance your employability skills, learn more about your professional goals and make steps toward them. Career Skills with Goldman Sachs will be happening all next week from Monday 18th to Friday 22nd July!
South & Central London (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/headstart-career-skills-session-in-association-with-goldman-sachs-tickets-26337961552) (RSVP here) (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/headstart-career-skills-session-in-association-with-goldman-sachs-tickets-26337961552) London Southbank University, Elephant & Castle Monday 18th July, Tuesday 19th July & Wednesday 20th July - 1.45pm to 5.30pm
North & Central London (RSVP here) (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/headstart-career-skills-session-in-association-with-goldman-sachs-tickets-26361854015) The Lift, Islington Thursday 21st July - 9.30am to 1pm
North London (RSVP here) (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/headstart-career-skills-session-in-association-with-goldman-sachs-tickets-26361904165) Resource for London, Holloway Friday 22nd July - 9.30am to 1pm
Click on the area above to RSVP. Tickets are limited - get in quick! Please note: As an NCS Graduate, you may have also been invited to other Employability Workshops with Goldman Sachs. These sessions cover different topics, and we definitely recommend attending both! Save the date for Get Ahead!
Join HeadStart Grads from all around London to celebrate your achievements in 2015.
Friday 5th August 1.30 - 4pm
Check out more info and RSVP here! (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/get-ahead-for-headstart-grads-tickets-26441946574) Any questions? Email us at headstart@the-challenge.org
We look forward to seeing you there!
Want to get in on the conversation? Join our brand new national social media channels to see what's going on in HeadStart around the country! https://www.facebook.com/UKHeadStart/?fref=ts https://www.instagram.com/ukheadstart/ https://twitter.com/UKHeadStart http://www.headstart-thechallenge.org/ mailto:headstart@the-challenge.org
